missing data
```{r}
litters_df = 
    read_csv(file = "data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv",
        na = c(".", "NA", "")
```

what if we code 'group' as a factor variable?

```{r}
litters_df = 
    read_csv(file = "data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv",
        na = c(".", "NA", ""),
    col_types = cols(
      Group = col_factor()
    )
)

head(litters_df)

```
